resources.string:
"The goal of yellow car is to find the most yellow cars." "Once a player has found a car they must say \“Yellow car\” which will give them one point." "The same goes for a green car except a green car removes a point from every player except for themselves.

" "General
" "Construction Vehicles/School buses do not count towards yellow car.
" "Yellow Flying Vehicles count as 10 \“Yellow Cars\”
" "The same Vehicle can only be counted once.
" "Purple vehicles are automatic winners if you yell Purple car, winner, winner chicken dinner
